name: Chest Quest!
description:
Chest Quest! The best chest based quest west of the rest!

Chest Quest is a game based on old school super difficult arcades.

Move: arrow keys / left thumbstick

Attack / Start: z / space / gamepad buttons

How to play:

Attacking with the hammer you can break open chests, flatten enemies and pound pegs into the ground. To proceed, pound all pegs in the area into the ground and head for the pad at the end of the room, this will change the blocks in the room into a new challenge.

Touching a monster will kill you, last as long as you can with three lives!
